Name: Arm Drive - Reinforce
Desc: Increases damage for Magnum Drive, Double Drive, Charging Arm: Smash, Shockwave Drive, Magnum Flash, and Hurricane Blaster.

Desc.Old: Increases damage for Magnum Drive, Double Drive, Charging Arm: Smash, Shockwave Drive, Magnum Flash, and Hurricane Blaster. This skill's effect does not apply to shock wave damage.
Desc.New: Increases damage for Magnum Drive, Double Drive, Charging Arm: Smash, Shockwave Drive, Magnum Flash, and Hurricane Blaster.
